channel.title: CVE Feed for NVIDIA -- Jetson AGX Xavier series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson TX2 series, Jetson TX2 NX
channel.description: The latest CVEs for NVIDIA -- Jetson AGX Xavier series, Jetson Xavier NX, Jetson TX2 series, Jetson TX2 NX

item.title: CVE-2023-25520|2023-06-23T17:23:21.837Z -- nvidia -- jetson%20agx%20xavier%20series%2C%20jetson%20xavier%20nx%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20series%2C%20jetson%20tx2%20nx
item.description: NVIDIA Jetson Linux Driver Package contains a vulnerability in nvbootctrl, where a privileged local attacker can configure invalid settings, resulting in denial of service.
